languages.text: "Только задница никуда не денется, даже если на нее не смотреть. И скоро все мы в ней окажемся, когда ведьмы придут мстить. Вряд ли они будут разбираться, кто там на арене разделывал их любимцев, а кто просто под горячую руку попался".

"But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."
languages.original_text: "Только задница никуда не денется, даже если на нее не смотреть. И скоро все мы в ней окажемся, когда ведьмы придут мстить. Вряд ли они будут разбираться, кто там на арене разделывал их любимцев, а кто просто под горячую руку попался".

traits.locale_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."
traits.speaker: Marked

traits.locale_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."

traits.locale_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."

traits.locale_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: “不过，就算不去看马的屁股，它也不会消失。等巫灵教派那群人来报仇的时候，我们恐怕就要死死地盯着它的屁股看了。不知道他们能不能发现是谁在竞技场上杀了他们钟爱的战士，也不知道是哪个倒霉的家伙会变成替罪羊。”
languages.original_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."

traits.locale_text: “不过，就算不去看马的屁股，它也不会消失。等巫灵教派那群人来报仇的时候，我们恐怕就要死死地盯着它的屁股看了。不知道他们能不能发现是谁在竞技场上杀了他们钟爱的战士，也不知道是哪个倒霉的家伙会变成替罪羊。”
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: 「でも、この馬の尻の穴は、見るのをやめても消えることはない。そして、ウィッチたちが復讐を果たしにやってくるとき、あたしたちは皆、すぐにそれを見つめることになるでしょう。誰が闘技場で自分たちのお気に入りを惨殺したのか、運が尽きたのは誰だったのか、彼らが解明できるとは思えない」
languages.original_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、この馬の尻の穴は、見るのをやめても消えることはない。そして、ウィッチたちが復讐を果たしにやってくるとき、あたしたちは皆、すぐにそれを見つめることになるでしょう。誰が闘技場で自分たちのお気に入りを惨殺したのか、運が尽きたのは誰だったのか、彼らが解明できるとは思えない」
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: «Pero el culo de este caballo no desaparece porque dejes de mirarlo. Y pronto lo veremos muy de cerca cuando las Brujas vengan a en busca de la venganza. No creo que sepan distinguir quiénes han masacrado a sus favoritos en la arena y quienes se han quedado sin suerte».
languages.original_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."

traits.locale_text: «Pero el culo de este caballo no desaparece porque dejes de mirarlo. Y pronto lo veremos muy de cerca cuando las Brujas vengan a en busca de la venganza. No creo que sepan distinguir quiénes han masacrado a sus favoritos en la arena y quienes se han quedado sin suerte».
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: « Mais la croupe de cet étalon-ci ne disparaît pas quand on détourne le regard et nous aurons bientôt le nez dedans quand les Cérastes débarqueront pour se venger. Ça m'étonnerait qu'ils parviennent à découvrir qui a massacré leurs favoris dans l'arène et qui a simplement fini par manquer de chance. »
languages.original_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."

traits.locale_text: « Mais la croupe de cet étalon-ci ne disparaît pas quand on détourne le regard et nous aurons bientôt le nez dedans quand les Cérastes débarqueront pour se venger. Ça m'étonnerait qu'ils parviennent à découvrir qui a massacré leurs favoris dans l'arène et qui a simplement fini par manquer de chance. »
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: "Aber der Hintern dieses Pferds verschwindet nicht einfach, wenn man nicht mehr hinguckt. Und schon bald, wenn die Hekatari auf ihre Rache aus sind, werden wir ihn alle anstarren müssen. Ich bezweifle, dass sie herausfinden werden, wer ihre Lieblinge in der Arena abgeschlachtet haben und wem einfach kein Glück hold war."
languages.original_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."

traits.locale_text: "Aber der Hintern dieses Pferds verschwindet nicht einfach, wenn man nicht mehr hinguckt. Und schon bald, wenn die Hekatari auf ihre Rache aus sind, werden wir ihn alle anstarren müssen. Ich bezweifle, dass sie herausfinden werden, wer ihre Lieblinge in der Arena abgeschlachtet haben und wem einfach kein Glück hold war."
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: "Ama sen ona bakmayınca atın götü yok olmuyor. Ayrıca Viçler yakında intikam almaya geldiğinde biz de o göte bakakalacağız. Arenadaki gözdelerini kimin katlettiğini ve kimin sadece bahtının tükendiğini ayırt edebileceklerinden şüpheliyim."
languages.original_text: "But the arse end of this horse doesn't disappear when you stop looking at it. And we'll all be staring at it soon enough when the Wyches come seeking revenge. I doubt they'll be able to figure out who butchered their favourites in the arena, and whose luck simply ran out."

traits.locale_text: "Ama sen ona bakmayınca atın götü yok olmuyor. Ve Viçler yakında intikam almaya geldiklerinde biz de o göte bakakalacağız. Arenadaki gözdelerini kimin katlettiğini ve kimin sadece bahtının tükendiğini ayırt edebileceklerinden şüpheliyim."
traits.speaker: Marked
